sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO t_location_collect_info ( DRIVER_ID, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, TOWN, LOCATION, COLLECT_TIME, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #driverId#, #longitude#, #latitude#, #province#, #city#, #county#, #town#, #location#, sysdate(), sysdate())
select last_insert_id() as id
